p.d: Allan Kardec and spiritualism The early 19th century. Allan Kardec claims that he can communicate with spirits and founds spiritualism. The Phantom of the Opera The second half of the 19th century. Strange events occur at the Opéra Garnier, giving rise to the legend of its phantom. Directed by: Grégory Monro (France, 2018) With Jean-Marc Léri.
